rows.label: tlk001201_08_msg0001
rows.name:
An attack from the heavens
is raining down upon Alst...

rows.label: tlk001201_08_msg0002
rows.name:
Fortunately, Luxuria has been spared,
but is Metsu truly trying to
destroy Alst?

rows.label: tlk001201_08_msg0003
rows.name:
We can neither defend against the Devices
nor stop them.

rows.label: tlk001201_08_msg0004
rows.name:
We have no choice but to entrust this to you...
Please, I ask of you. The future of Alst.
